Quick search

MainWindow module¶

class MainWindow.MainWindow(master)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

The root class in the application, contains all objects. Handles the basic GUI layout, as well as passing messages between the network code (NetworkManager) and the ConversationTabs where input is taken and output is displayed. Inherits from tkinter.Frame.

add_tab(newId)[source]¶

A method that adds a tab with the given ID. The ID is also the title.

Parameters:newId (str) – The ID of the new tab
create_widgets()[source]¶

Method to initialize default GUI elements, namely the Notebook and the Overview tab.

on_close()[source]¶

A method called when the root window is closed. Signals the NetworkManager to close all connections, then closes the window.

queue_loop()[source]¶

A looping method to handle function calls passed from the network manager via the instructionQueue. Repeats every 250ms. Used to placate tkinter’s hatred of threads

send_text(thisId, text)[source]¶

A method called by ConversationTabs to send the given text to the NetworkManager to be sent.

Parameters:
  • thisId (str) – The ID of the tab sending the message
  • text (str) – The text to be sent.
tab_closed(tabId)[source]¶

A method called by the CustomNotebook when a tab is closed by pressing the ‘X’ button.

Parameters:tabId (str) – The ID of the tab to be closed.
text_received(thisId, text)[source]¶

A method to add a given string to the ConversationTab with the given ID.

Parameters:
  • thisId (str) – The ID of the tab where the message should be sent.
  • text (str) – The text to be added to the tab.
